body.name: PREXTEX 2pk Remote Control Cars for 3-5 Year Old Boys - Truck & Tractor Toddler Toys
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 30 mins
features: 2 REMOTE-CONTROL CARS - A set of two cartoon remote control car toys for 3-year-old boys with music and sound features, two different removable action figures, and two remote controls with forward and reverse motions. Cars have realistic sirens, honking sounds, and flashing headlights.

PERFECT FOR YOUR NEXT PLAYDATE - Designed as a child's first remote control toy car, the cartoon police car and race car come with a steering wheel-shaped controller with only two buttons for easy control. Both vehicles can be played with at once. Grab a brother, sister, cousin, or friend, and start racing!

EASY TO SET UP - The vehicles require 3 AA batteries and the remotes 2 AA batteries. Place the batteries in both vehicles and controllers and watch your toddlers have endless fun. Batteries not included.

GREAT GIFT - Perfect 3-year-old boy gift for holidays, birthday toys for boys, and school classroom prizes. Kids remote control cars can be played on desks and on the ground. Best remote control car toys for boys 3-5 years old.

FUN & SAFE - At Prextex Toys, we will do our best to make you thrilled with your purchase. Prextex remote control cars are child-safe and will provide your little one with hours of imaginative play and fun!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: PREXTEX Remote Control Monster Police Truck Radio Control PREXTEX Toddler Remote Control Car PREXTEX Kids Remote Control Car - RC Stunt Car Remote control car ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are amazing!
reviews.reviewText: These little remote control cars are amazing! I got them for my 2 year old grandson and he loves them! They are simple enough to use that he can do it, yet fun enough that even my 26 year old son and 27 year old son in law could not stop playing with them. They are speedy little things and work well on all surfaces. They are extremely durable, we were running them into walls, furniture, dogs, ect and they just kept going. I have not had to replace the batteries in them yet. All in all I was very impressed with this purchase and highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super awesome — just buy it.
reviews.reviewText: Just buy this. It’s so cute and fun. The quality is extremely good for the price. Bought it for my 2.5 year old for Christmas and she loves driving them all over the house! Fun for parents too! I can see our family keeping these around for many years and I highly recommend. Note: these do not work well on carpet and do not work at all on heavy/thick carpet. Best on hard floors. Requires a decent amount of batteries but it’s so worth it. Provides a lot of entertainment. They have fallen down a short flight of 6 stairs a few times and they still work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such a fun set of cars for our 3 year old grandsons to race each other!
reviews.reviewText: These cars were a ton of fun for our 3 year old grandsons!! They both could race each other. The cars moved smoothly and were easy to operate, but had lots of fun things to do like buttons to press for fun sounds, backward and forwards or go in a circle (the kids loved that), and little people to ride in them! Not too loud to be annoying either. Took lots of batteries, 10 total for the 2 cars and their controllers, but they lasted throughout the kids trip so a number of hours solid use. Stood up to 3 year old boys tossing them around too. A really fun toy that one or two kids can play with and race each other. Ran on all surfaces, wood, low carpet, and even bumpy terrain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My item arrived in packing that looked like it had been very poorly handled. The toy cars did work however and nothing was broken. After using the cars on Christmas Day I noticed the antennas will not stay tighten on the remotes, but the cars will work without them. Otherwise they are a neat little toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Child’s remote cars
reviews.reviewText: We actually have a couple sets of these. One at home and one in our camper. Grandkids love them and they are 1 an 2 yrs old. We tied colored ribbons to the matching remotes to make easier for them to tell which one they has. Easy to use, just needs a couple batteries turn off when not in us. Fun easy toy for kids to play with:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Original review : I bought this item so that each of my two grandchildren could have their own toy to play with. Unfortunately, only one car works. This has caused a massive amount of arguing and fighting!!!Updated review : A few days after I posted the original review (see above), the seller reached out to me regarding the issue I had with the cars. He/she informed me that a new set of cars would be sent to my grandchildren. Today my son notified me that the new cars had arrived, and both cars work great. Both kids love them and are very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Our 4 and 6 year old use these. They are durable! The on off switch on each car is great. They sing and talk. Remind me of bumper cars. They run on carpet, but of course not fast. Every other flooring, they are quick on. Batteries last in the cars and remotes. Police office and racer don't come out of the car. Bright colors. Super fun for their first remote control cars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They don’t make them like they used to.
reviews.reviewText: My SIL has an old set of these remote control cars that have been going strong for years that the kids love. I decided to purchase for my son for Christmas and they didn’t even last one week before they started to malfunction. One doesn’t work at all and the other only spins circles. For the amount of money spent, I don’t feel like they’re worth it since they don’t last. Too bad everything is made in China and complete junk nowadays.

Bought for my daughter for Christmas. Took 10 AA batteries (3 in each car and 2 in each remote). Gave both a little test drive and they both work well. Seem pretty sturdy so I hope they hold up. Very nice to get 2 cars and 2 figures for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Tried and tested ready for grandchildren over Christmas. Good, chunky vehicles with easy controls. Plenty of sounds for interest. Works very well over low pile carpet.Will be a hit with the adults as well on Christmas day!

I bought these for my kids on their 2nd birthday and they just loved them. They make lots of noise, very easy controls and the kids have so much fun learning to drive them. For a childs first remote control car they are great and very affordable. Happy they were so decently priced for two cars, one for each kid.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these remote control cars for my little boys (2 and 6 years) for Christmas. They love them, so easy to use and they really enjoy racing each other. I had a problem with the original ones I received but the customer support team were excellent, very quick to respond and resolved the issue immediately.

reviews.reviewTitle: First set I bought lasted years .
reviews.reviewText: I bought this set for our kids like 6 years ago. And they lasted a long time , they eventually died , but loved how durable they are with young young kids using them.My son accidentally bought another set from my Alexa , and I’m disappointed that the second one stopped working just months after . Too late to send it back now 😬
